item.title: Write Forever: AEW Dynamite Grand Slam 9/20/23
item.description: Can Samoa Joe become the new AEW World Heavyweight Champion, or is MJF going to right the wrong of being shoved in a hallway eight years ago?
item.dc:creator: Ganso Bomb

item.title: REWIND: War Games, Fall Brawl 1994
item.description: Can a match look so bad on paper but actually end up turning out to be pretty fun when all is said and done? Fall Brawl: War Games puts that question to the test!
item.dc:creator: Ganso Bomb

item.title: Write Forever: AEW Dynamite 9/13/23
item.description: NECK STRONG Roderick Strong battled Samoa Joe in the finals of the Grand Slam Eliminator Tournament. Did Roderick avenge his neck tonight ahead of avenging his former best friend next week at Grand Slam?
item.dc:creator: Ganso Bomb

item.title: REWIND: Ric Flair & Sting vs Dick Slater & Great Muta

item.title: REWIND: Terry Funk vs Bret Hart, 50 Years of Funk
item.description: Terry Funk retires for what is definitely the last time in a match against Bret Hart on an unprecedented card which brought together wrestlers from different promotions around the world.

item.title: Write Forever: AEW Collision 9/9/23
item.description: A perfectly fine episode of Collision, but definitely not one for the books. The Grand Slam Tournament continues on with Roderick Strong and Samoa Joe advancing to the finals.
item.dc:creator: Ganso Bomb

item.title: REWIND: Sting vs Barry Windham, Fall Brawl '88
